data.text: Congratulations on completing all basic assessments in <color=#F26C1C>{0}</color>. You are now qualified for independent exploration of the Contamination Zones. B.R.I.E.F. will remain attentive to your advancement, and we look forward to more active contributions from you.
Actively explored unsurveyed areas and completed <color=#F26C1C>{0}</color> Boundary Push missions.
Archived a progress of <color=#F26C1C>{0}</color> in Boundary Push missions.
Strived to reactivate and calibrate the Light Particle Vane, archiving a total Calibration Rate of <color=#F26C1C>{0}%</color>.
Responded appropriately to Special Bounties and commanded Dolls squads in <color=#F26C1C>{0}</color> sorties.
Reached a max Bounty level of <color=#F26C1C>{0}</color>.
Collected a total of <color=#F26C1C>{0}</color> Storage Card crafting material,
Using said materials, you crafted <color=#F26C1C>{0}</color> Storage Cards at the Analysis Machine.
Using Storage Cards, you conducted <color=#F26C1C>{0}</color> Directed Dispatch; you’ve maintained a strong grasp of your goals, and fortune will smile upon you for that.
Through Special Bounties, you've acquired <color=#F26C1C>{0}</color> <color=#F26C1C>precise grade attachments</color>; your continuous effort is bound to yield remarkable results!
